repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The text seems only published in Telugu script. It needs further attention to check if it is Āpastamba pūrvaprayoga or Vīraśaiva pūrvaprayoga. Note with title and script information -- Purvaprayoga Dharma Grantha 204 pages.. 12 lines. (204 pages this information does not match. Total folio 78 including blank and written and guard folio. 156 pages) Some folio has small corners broken. White dots due to fungus.

msItem.title: Pūrvaprayoga ( from Nāmakaraṇa to Samāvartana)
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 tatra saukauryauna divasā ha .. nāmakarmadaśacy?tha vasūnityaṃ daśe śūciṣu vā vidhīyante jananāddaśehani nāmaka 1v 2 rmakarttavyaṃ tadabhāve dvādaśehni kartavyaṃ . tadabhāve rāśiṣu tithivāranakṣatreṣu kartavyaṃ tathāha vasiṣṭhaḥ . daśamedvādaśe vāhni nāmakarma vidhīyante tataḥ paraṃ vi 1v 3 dhānoktaṃ vāranakṣatrarāśiṣu .
42v 12 sākṣātkārādūrlabdhende (illegible 2 syllables) yacyavahāravaśāt saṃbhāvitasya papatyaāśeṣaśriyaṃnte tadyathā puṣkarapalāśa āśpā? na śiṣyante e 42v 13 vaṃ vinipātakarma na sīṣyata iti sākṣātkārāt pūrvantu sahasrasmṛtijanmāntareṣu ca sanci?
msItem.explicit: 43r 11 tayordvividhayogarapi akarmatvamātya naḥ dhyānaṃ tat bodhañca samaḥ tato nārasvapadārabdayora

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 33 folio blank. 43 folio written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numeral in the left margin.

handNote.desc: Writing is very unclear.. clusters are very doubtful.

additions.desc: On 1v in the left margin title - nāmākaraṇavidhi

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added for word separation.
